#summary The TaxonomyGraph class

This class creates a directed graph with Taxonomy hierarchical tree from parent to child. 

This is a recursive class that extends the [BioWHGraph] class and override the [http://jbiowh.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/javadoc/org/jbiowh/core/utility/graph/BioWHGraph.html#populate(java.lang.Object,%20int) populate] method for any entity object. 

The graph created is a [http://jgrapht.org/javadoc/org/jgrapht/graph/ListenableDirectedGraph.html ListenableDirectedGraph].

The TaxonomyGraph class [http://jbiowh.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/javadoc/org/jbiowh/core/datasets/taxonomy/utils/TaxonomyGraph.html JavaDoc] and [https://code.google.com/p/jbiowh/source/browse/trunk/src/main/java/org/jbiowh/core/datasets/taxonomy/utils/TaxonomyGraph.java code]. 

See [Example5 example 5] and [Example6 example 6]
